Name: Show URL path
Description: Can I see full URL path of the network requests?

Chrome.Notes:
1. In the **Network** tab, open "Network settings" (top-right).
2. Check the option "Use large request rows" to show the URL path under the resource name<sup>[1]</sup>

Firefox.Notes: 1. In the **Network** panel, right click on the column header, and select URL. This will add a new column in the grid, which contains the full URL of the resource.

Edge.Notes:
1. In the **Network** tab, open "Network settings" (top-right).
2. Check the option "Use large request rows" to show the URL path under the resource name.

Safari.Notes: 1. In the **Network** panel, right click on the column header, and select "Path" to add a new column showing the URL path for the resource.

Opera.Notes:
1. In the **Network** tab, open "Network settings" (top-right).
2. Check the option "Use large request rows" to show the URL path under the resource name.
